getNetworkExtrasBundle(java.lang.Class<T.Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter. Returns null if no network extras of the provided type were set.

getContentUrl().Description: Returns the content url targeting information. Returns null if the contentUrl was not set.

getPublisherProvidedId().Description: Returns the identifier used for frequency capping, audience segmentation and targeting, sequential ad rotation, and other audience-based ad delivery controls across devices.

isTestDevice(android.content.Context).Description: Returns true if this device will receive test ads.

getCustomEventExtrasBundle(java.lang.Cla.Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific custom event adapter. Returns null if no custom event extras of the provided type were set.

getGender().Description: Returns the user's gender targeting information. Returns -1 if the gender was not set.

getLocation().Description: Returns the user's location targeting information. Returns null if the location was not set.

getKeywords().Description: Returns targeting information keywords. Returns an empty @B_java#util#Set_E@ if no keywords were added.

updateCorrelator().Description: Changes the correlator that is sent with ad requests, effectively starting a new page view. The correlator is the same for all the ad requests coming from one page view, and unique across page views. After updating the correlator, ads must be refreshed for the new correlator to take effect.

getManualImpressionsEnabled().Description: Returns true if manual impression reporting is enabled.

getNetworkExtras(java.lang.Class<T>).Description: Returns extra parameters to pass to a specific ad network adapter. Ad network adapters provide a @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#mediation#NetworkExtras_E@ class. Returns null if no network extras of the provided type were set.

getBirthday().Description: Returns the user's birthday targeting information. Returns null if the birthday was not set.

ClassDesc: A @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#doubleclick#PublisherAdRequest_E@ contains targeting information used to fetch an ad from DoubleClick for Publishers. Ad requests are created using @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#doubleclick#PublisherAdRequest#Builder_E@.
